action.name: Call function
action.param: "so, uh, your browser" & newline & "doesn't seem to support" & newline & "webGL."{###}"NoEffects1"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "i had to make my speech" & newline & "bubble inverted just so" & newline & "you can see what i'm" & newline & "saying."{###}"NoEffects4"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "most importantly, my blue" & newline & "attacks will look like" & newline & "normal attacks."{###}"NoEffects5"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You felt your sins crawling" & newline & " on your back."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You felt your sins weighing" & newline & " on your neck."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* KARMA coursing through your" & newline & " veins."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You feel like you're going to" & newline & " have the worst time of your" & newline & " life."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You know Sans is going to have" & newline & " the worst time of his life."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You feel like cheating the" & newline & " whole fight."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You start to think this fight is" & newline & " harder than expected."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You start to think this fight is" & newline & " easier than expected."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You felt your sins crawling" & newline & " on your back."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* Reading this doesn't seem" & newline & " like the best use of time."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You think you should eat" & newline & " something."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You think you're going to die."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* Sans seems to be done with" & newline & " being fair."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You are starting to have" & newline & " regrets."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You seem to be done with" & newline & " being fair."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* Sans is thinking about killing" & newline & " you."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You don't think you are going" & newline & " to survive."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You know him, lets not waste our" & newline & " chance."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* SANS 5 ATK 5 DEF" & newline & "* The hardest enemy." & newline & "* Be careful."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* SANS 1 ATK 1 DEF" & newline & "* The easiest enemy..." & newline & "* But something feels different"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* But we've killed him before, we" & newline & " can do it again."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* He seems to have Gone Mad."

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You eat the " & ItemDB.At(ItemID, 2) & "." & newline & "* You recovered " & ItemDB.At(ItemID, 1) & " HP!"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "* You eat the " & ItemDB.At(ItemID, 2) & "." & newline & "* Your HP was maxed out."

sub-events.comment: No idea what is going on here, so decompiled code ftw.
Original calculation meant to lerp BaseSize to 35*scale over 4 frames at 30fps

action.name: Call function
action.param: "do you still expect" & newline & "me to just stand there" & newline & "and take it?"{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "i don't really get why" & newline & "you're doing this."{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "you're really asking for" & newline & "it now, kid."{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "how about we make it" & newline & "a bit harder"{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "didja really think u were" & newline & "able to hit me?"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "'cause after this attack" & newline & "you're about to face" & newline & "something really tire-ing."{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "i'm not going to go easy" & newline & "on you now."{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "we both know that you" & newline & "didn't need that turn" & newline & "anyway."{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "this is gonna be harder" & newline & "than i thought."{###}"EndSansText"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "guess you like doing" & newline & "things the hard way, huh?"{###}"Dialogue"
